author: wn.com
title: NDC Boycotted To Avoid Any Intellectual Injury On IEA's 'Deadly' Turf - Koku Anyidoho
text: Several questions keep trickling in following the National Democratic Congress ’ ( NDC ) decision to back out of a debate which was organized by the Institute of Economic Affairs ( IEA ) to solicit their views on the need for a new voters’
